text: Petropavlovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Kacheganovsky Selsoviet, Miyakinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 46 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 29 km from Kirgiz-Miyaki, 9 km from Kacheganovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Miyakinsky District
title: Petropavlovka, Miyakinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
